1.title: #164: The Party Starts Again! (Season 5 Premiere)
1.plot: For the 5th Season premiere, AKB48 16th Generation performs "Party ga Hajimaru yo", honoring the tradition in every 1st episode of October. Hana Matsuoka is the guest for Mirumiru's Art Club. Momoka Kinoshita's graduation special.

4.title: Remix 06: Team 8 SP
4.plot: In the 6th installment from REMIX SERIES, watch a recap from best performances of TEAM 8.

5.title: #167: NMB48 LIVE 2017 in Summer
5.plot: This week: Infiltration report from NMB48's concert, featuring Fu Yabushita and Yumiko Takino (from STU48).

6.title: #168: End Roll
6.plot: This week, TEAM 8 performs "End Roll". Akari Yoshida is interviewed on Mirumiru's Club Art.

7.title: #169: November Anklet
7.plot: This week, AKB48 performs their latest single.

8.title: Remix 07: Fall & winter Songs
8.plot: In the 7th installment of the REMIX SERIES, watch the best performances from fall and winter songs. Enjoy "Suzukake Nanchara", "12gatsu no Kangaroo", and so much more.

9.title: 48 & 46 Special
9.plot: Making of from "11gatsu no Anklet" music video. Infiltration reports from Nogizaka46 Underlive and Tour Final from Tokyo Dome.

10.title: AKB48 Show Remix #08: Nogizaka46 Show Remix - Part 2
10.plot: Recap from best performances of Nogizaka46 Show series.

11.title: Warota People
11.plot: NMB48 performs their latest single, "Warota People". Debut performance from BNK48.

12.title: 68th Kouhaku Utagassen SP
12.plot: Highlights and AKB48 and Sakamichi Groups performances from 68th NHK Kouhaku Utagassen, held on December 31, 2017.

13.title: #173: Hiragana Keyakizaka Show!
13.plot: Special themed episode hosted by Hiragana Keyaki. Special report from their Summer Tour 2017 final concert.

14.title: #174: Unconscious Color
14.plot: SKE48 performs their latest single. Yui Yokoyama interviews Akari Yoshida in her lecture room.

15.title: AKB48 Show Remix #09: NGT48
15.plot: Recap from previous performances from NGT48, including the winning song from Request Hour 2018.

16.title: #175: Kurayami
16.plot: STU48 performs their debut single "Kurayami". Infiltration report from 2017 Janken Tournament.

17.title: Nogizaka46 Show #16
17.plot: Join Nogizaka46 for a performance from "Itsuka Dekiru Kara Kyou Dekiru".

18.title: I'm so glad for remember me
18.plot: Studio live performances from SKE48, Kotono Shirai and Fuusae. Juri Takahashi is interviewed by Miru Shiroma in her Art Club. Comedy skit starring Jurina Matsui.

19.title: AKB48 Show Remix #10: Fresh Members
19.plot: Compilation of best performances from past episodes, featuring young members of 48G.

20.title: #178: Nani ka ga Iru, Max Toki 315go (Piano Version), Seifuku Resistance
20.plot: This week, stay tuned for amazing performances from STU48 and NGT48. Moeka Takakura performs a solo version from "Max Toki 315go".

21.title: #179: Jabaja, Wagamama na Nagareboshi
21.plot: This week, AKB48 delivers you a powerful performance from their 51st single. Rie Kitahara is interviewed by Miru Shiroma in her Art Club. Making of STU48 music video from "Kurayami".

22.title: #180: Keyakizaka46 Show
22.plot: This week, stay tuned for another Keyakizaka48 Show, with amazing performances from their 6th single "Glass wo Ware" and coupling songs.

23.title: AKB48 Show Remix #11: Graduated Members Special
23.plot: Recap from the final performances from graduated members.

24.title: AKB48 Show Remix #12: Greatest Hits Special
24.plot: Recap from 19 songs from AKB48 performed since the Series Premiere.

1.title: Let's Get the Party Started!
1.plot: SERIES PREMIERE: Dressing room skit starring Yui Yokoyama and Yuko Oshima, Monster OL, AKB's Highly Intense Classroom.

2.title: Heavy Rotation
2.plot: AKB48 performs "Heavy Rotation". Weekly comedy skit: "Security Gate". NMB48 performs Kamonegix. AKB48 Intense Classroom - Lesson 02. Backstage from 4th Janken Tournament. Miyu Takeuchi performs a piano rendition from "Shonichi".

3.title: Beautiful Lightning
3.plot: SKE48 performs "Utsukushii Inazuma". Comedy skit: Roll Call. HKT48 performs "Melon Juice". Takamina interviews Rina Kawaei in lecture room. AKB48 Intense Clasroom. Acoustic performance from "Dazai Osamu wo Yonda ka?".

4.title: The First Yukirin Solo Performance
4.plot: This week, AKB48 brings to you a performance from "Heart Electric", their latest single. Also, Yuki Kashiwagi and HKT48 performs.

5.title: Heart Still Electric
5.plot: Stubborn Shopkeeper's Ramen Shop; Infiltration Series - Not yet HALLOWEEN Event; Haven't heard about until now - AKB's Highly Intense Classroom.

6.title: Purity Philosophy
6.plot: 48 Group Daily(?) Series - Getting too used to being in the entertainment world; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Shimazaki Haruka; Haven't heard about until now - AKB's Highly Intense Classroom.

7.title: Holding on to My Hand
7.plot: Genba Manager; Infiltration Series - SKE Request Hour 2013; Haven't heard about until now - AKB's Highly Intense Classroom.

8.title: Suzukake Nanchara
8.plot: Sukeban Maeda Deka; Infiltration Series - SKE Request Hour 2013; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Kojima Haruna.

9.title: I Agree, You're Cute!
9.plot: A lot of questions Hamburger Shop; NMB48 Kouhaku Uta Gassen Report; Haven't heard about until now - AKB's Highly Intense Classroom.

10.title: AKB48 8th Anniversary Countdown Live!
10.plot: Special live broadcast from AKB48 THEATER, celebrating the 8th anniversary from the most famous idol group in the world.

11.title: AKB48 8th Anniversary Theater Performance
11.plot: Special Footage of the AKB48 8th Anniversary Theater Performance, including a Special Medley where each generation performs a song of their choosing. Plus, Yuko Oshima visits General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room

12.title: Christmas Special
12.plot: This week, 48 SHOW joins the Xmas spirit with themed performances. Check out a comedy skit with a crazy Santa and the G48 of the girls in a vaccination day.

13.title: Post-Kouhaku Special 2014
13.plot: On December 31, 2013, AKB48 and other sister groups have performed on annual NHK Kouhaku Utagassen, but a surprise announcement shocked the members: Yuko Oshima is graduating.

14.title: Yuko Oshima in AKB48 Theater
14.plot: Oshima Yuko in Theater; 48 Group Daily Series - Bento Please; Infiltration Series - Team N Original Stage Shonichi.

15.title: Genie of the Lamp
15.plot: Enjoy the comedy skit "Genie of the Lamp" and the glorious tune from AKB48, "First Rabbit".

16.title: General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room SP
16.plot: A Recap of General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room segments.

17.title: Valentine's Special
17.plot: Enjoy a Valentine's Day special from AKB48 SHOW!

18.title: Gotta Face Forward
18.plot: AKB48 performs; part time job interview; Grand Shuffle Festival announcement; Miori Ichikawa at Takamina's Lecture room.

19.title: Nogizaka46 Show!
19.plot: In the first installment from N46 SHOW series, enjoy performances from Nogizaka46. This time, Takamina is interviewed by Reika Sakurai in lecture room.

20.title: SKE48 in Nagoya
20.plot: On Infiltration Series, join SKE48 on their concert in Nagoya Dome; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits; in honor to 100 million views, we proudly bring to you a music video from "Heavy Rotation".

21.title: What Is the Future?
21.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - Yokoyama and Kawaei; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Watanabe Mayu; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits.

22.title: 3 Years After Disaster
22.plot: 3 years after Tohoku disaster, 48G members make a special visit on affected regions.

23.title: Spring Concert Highlights: Special Live Broadcast
23.plot: In this special episode, live from Olympic Stadium, AKB48 shares some of the best moments of the spring concert held on this day. In addition, this episode was celebrated the birthday Haruka Shimazaki, which has an exciting surprise.

24.title: Yuko Oshima SP
24.plot: Enclosed coverage, Yuko Oshima interviews Akari Suda in lecture room, announcement of concert cancellation due to bad weather.

25.title: Unreachable Apple
25.plot: NMB48 performs "Takane no Ringo", At the "Tell Picacci" Recording, SKE48 performs "Escape", Infiltration Series - HKT48 Concert, The 3 Kojimas performs "Heart Gata Virus".

26.title: Nogizaka46 Show Once Again!
26.plot: Second installment from N46 SHOW series, for releasing their 8th single "Kizuitara Kataomoi".

27.title: Seishun's Lap Time
27.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - Delusional Girl Oba; Haven't heard about until now - AKB's Highly Intense Classroom.

28.title: AKB48 Request Hour SP
28.plot: Infiltration Series - AKB48 Request Hour Set List 2014

29.title: Team Zaka
29.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - Komari Komama; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Oba Mina.

30.title: Labrador Retriever
30.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - 36 members selected set; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Sashihara Rino; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits.

31.title: Cabin Attendant
31.plot: Cabin Attendant, 6th Senbatsu Sousenkyo post - 1st Day Results Interviews; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Kashiwagi Yuki.

32.title: Post-Sousenkyo: Live from Ajinomoto Stadium
32.plot: Live episode, reviewing the 6th Senbatsu Sousenkyo with Mayu Watanabe.

33.title: Team B SP
33.plot: Enjoy a special presentation from Team B, plus another episode from "Yokoyama & Kawaei".

34.title: Tentoumu Chu!
34.plot: Tentoumu Chu performs; 48 Group Daily Series - 1 Day Policewoman Infiltration Series - NMB48 Team N stage Shonichi 2014; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits.

35.title: Documentary of AKB48: A to Z 2014 - Part 1
35.plot: First part of TV adaptation from "Documentary of AKB48: The Time Has Come".

36.title: Documentary of AKB48: A to Z 2014 - Part 2
36.plot: Second and last part of TV adaptation from "Documentary of AKB48: The Time Has Come".

37.title: All Together Now
37.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - We won't lose to Tokyo; Infiltration Series - SKE48 14th Single and HKT48 3rd Single National Handshake Event; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits.

38.title: Nogizaka46 Show! The Third Act
38.plot: In the third installment from N46 SHOW series, Rina Ikoma will be interviewed by Captain Sakurai in her lecture room.

39.title: Ibiza Girl
39.plot: NMB48 performs "Ibiza Girl"; Delusional Girl Oba; HKT48 Arena final concert on Infiltration Series.

40.title: Clumsy Sun
40.plot: SKE48 performs "Bukiyou Taiyou"; Doutonbori Pretty Fighter; Takamina interviews Aika Ota in her lecture room.

41.title: The Heart's Placard
41.plot: AKB48 performs "Kokoro no Placard"; 48 Group Daily Series - Dasu Observation Diary; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Yamamoto Sayaka; SKE48 performs "Gomen ne, SUMMER".

42.title: Matsumulove!
42.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - Yokoyama and Kawaei: Women Too Accustomed to Showbiz~; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Uchiyama Natsuki; Matsumura Kaori's solo single launch.

43.title: Mayu Watanabe Show!
43.plot: SEASON FINALE: In this episode, Mayu Watanabe (winner of Senbatsu Sousenkyo) is the main star of its program for a day.

1.title: 1st Anniversary Special
1.plot: SEASON 2 PREMIERE: 1st Anniversary special live broadcast from AKB48 Theater, in Akihabara.

2.title: The Party Starts Once Again!
2.plot: This week, join 48G at the Natsu Matsuri and enjoy performances from Team 8 and French Kiss.

3.title: Natsu Matsuri
3.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - Festival Guests are AKB; Infiltration Series - AKB48 Natsu Matsuri 2014; AKB48 Disaster area visit.

4.title: Your Rope of Love
4.plot: Infiltration Series - AKB48 Tokyo Dome concert; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Owada Nana

5.title: Nogizaka46 Show! The Fourth Act
5.plot: In the fourth installment from N46 SHOW series, Nogizaka46 perform their latest single. On "Infiltration Series", the final concert from summer tour.

6.title: It's Not Like Me
6.plot: This week, NMB48 brings their 10th single "Rashikunai". Rie Kitahara visits General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room. Nana Owada & Mako Kojima closes the show with "Miniskirt no Yosei".

7.title: Switch!
7.plot: AKB48 performs "Switch", Gold Smartphone, Takamina interviews Miku Tanabe in lecture room, AKB48 Disaster Area Visit, Sayaka Yamamoto and Nana Yamada performs "Tomodachi".

8.title: SKE48 Show!
8.plot: Recap of the past performances and comedy skits performed by SKE48, prior the release of their 16th single, "12gatsu no Kangaroo".

9.title: Hopeful Refrain
9.plot: Doutonbori Pretty Fighter - Kuidaore Takomi; Kibouteki Refrain Behind the Scenes look at filming the MV .

10.title: December Kangaroo
10.plot: SKE48 performs "12gatsu no Kangaroo". 48 Group Daily Series - Scout. General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Momoka Kinoshita. AKB48 Team A performs "Nagai Hikari".

11.title: Milky Show!
11.plot: Miyuki Watanabe is the main star of this episode, for his victory in the Janken Tournament.

12.title: An Eventful Christmas
12.plot: Travel Agency; AKB48 Group Reverse Janken Tournament; Infiltration Series - SKE48 Kenkyuusei "Upcoming" Performance.

13.title: HKT48 Show!
13.plot: Recap of past performances and comedy skits performed by HKT48, in a Year-end special.

14.title: Post-Kouhaku Special
14.plot: In this episode, join the 48G groups behind the scenes of "65 NHK Kouhaku Utagassen".

15.title: HKT48 in Taiwan
15.plot: This week, join HKT48 in their concert at Taiwan and AKB48 Group Vaccination Day.

16.title: Imagination of the Poets
16.plot: On this episode, NMB48 performs "Souzou no Shijin". Enjoy highlights from AKB48 9th anniversary stage, held on December 8th 2014. To close the show, Team Surprise performs "Reborn".

17.title: NMB48 Show!
17.plot: Summary of musical performances and comedy skits with NMB48.

18.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Celebrating the First Album Release
18.plot: In the fifth installment from N46 SHOW series, Nogizaka46 celebrates the release of "Toumei in Iro" with another special episode with exciting performances.

19.title: Introducting Team 8
19.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - Komari Komama; Infiltration Series - 4th AKB48 Kouhaku Taikou Uta Gassen.

20.title: AKB48 Request Hour SP
20.plot: Highlights from AKB48 Request Hour 2015, and 48 Group Coming of Age Ceremony.

21.title: Green Flash
21.plot: Cinderella; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Nishino Miki; AKB48 Disaster Area Visit.

22.title: Woman Too Acostumed to Showbiz
22.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - Yokoyama and Kawaei; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Okada Nana.

23.title: Nogizaka46 Show! One Night Carnival
23.plot: In the sixth installment from N46 SHOW series, Nogizaka46 performs their 11th single "Inochi wa Utsukushi". Nogidan makes the festival to close the show with a rendition of Kishidan's classic song "One Night Carnival".

24.title: 4 Years After Great Earthquake
24.plot: Four years after the tragedy in Tohoku, the G48 groups make a special visit in the special episode of AKB48 SHOW!

25.title: We Can't Lose to Tokyo!
25.plot: This week, check out the SKE48 in her latest single, as well as special performance of Nana Yamada. Saya Kawamoto will be interviewed by Takamina in his room reading, and has much more in 48 SHOW!

27.title: Sorry for Being So Cute
27.plot: "Sorry for Being so Cute" - Mini Drama; NMB48's Happenings.

28.title: AKB48 in Jakarta
28.plot: This week: AKB48 in Jakarta and the AKB48 Outfit Museum.

29.title: The Three Naniwa Sisters
29.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - The Three Naniwa Sisters; Infiltration Series - SKE48 Musical "AKB49 ~Renai Kinshi Jourei~"; AKB48 Disaster Area Visit .

30.title: 12 Seconds
30.plot: This week, HKT48 will deliver you a performance from "12byô".

31.title: Coffee Shop + Sousenkyo Preliminaries
31.plot: This week, AKB48 performs their latest single. Furthermore, check out the "Infiltration" from Spring Concert, and preliminaries from 7th General Elections.

32.title: Post-Sousenkyo: Live from Fukuoka
32.plot: Highlights from the "7th Senbatsu Sousenkyo" held on Fukuoka, and hosted by Rino Sashihara, winner from this year.

33.title: Durian Shounen
33.plot: On this episode, NMB48 performed for the first time their 12th single, "Durian Shounen".

34.title: Infiltration Series Double Feature
34.plot: 2nd AKB48 Draft Kaigi and HKT48 Sashihara Rino Zachou Kouen.

35.title: Our Eureka
35.plot: Nurse Milky; Infiltration Series - 2nd AKB48 Sports Meet; AKB48 Disaster Area Visit

36.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Taiyou Knock
36.plot: In the seventh installment from N46 SHOW series, Nogizaka46 performs their 12th single, "Taiyou Knock". Enjoy the comedy skit "Nogizaka Sushi" and joins N46 for the final stage from "Joshiraku".

37.title: Choose Me!
37.plot: AKB48 Group Daily(?) Series - The Three Naniwa Sisters; Infiltration Series - "Majisuka Gakuen" Stage Musical ~Kyoto-Chifu Field Trip~; Nishino Miki's Energetic Dance Classroom

38.title: Rina Kawaei's Graduation Special Edition
38.plot: This week, let's celebrate the graduation of Rina Kawaei. At the opening performance, SKE48 presents "Maenomeri" last single with the participation of Rena Matsui, plus the final episode of "Yokoyama and Kawaei".

39.title: Pareo Emerald
39.plot: In comedy skit this week, a fun parody of Peter Pan, and Mayu Watanabe performs the song "Magirashiteiru" with live band.

40.title: Halloween Night
40.plot: This week, enjoy AKB48's latest single "Halloween Night". In Lecture Room, Takamina interviews Sakura Miyawaki. Infiltration report from "Mizu no Naka no Dendouritsu" music video.

41.title: Rena Matsui Show!
41.plot: Rena Matsui says goodbye in glamorous style as a member of SKE48, with a special episode.

42.title: A Very Special Halloween Night
42.plot: Enjoy the fashion "Halloween Night" from AKB48 members. Furthermore, follow NGT48 for the final auditions prior the official premiere.

43.title: Team 8 SP
43.plot: Team 8 performs "Seifuku ga Jama wo Suru", Rabbit and Turtle, Takamina interviews Nanami Yamada in lecture room, Chou Kurena perfiorms "47 no Suteki na Machi e".

44.title: NMB48 Request Hour SP
44.plot: In the season finale of 48 SHOW, join the NMB48 in the highlights and backstage scenes of their Request Hour. Also check AKB48 at the "Susnhiny Asa" Asadora press conference.

1.title: Another Party Begins!
1.plot: SEASON 3 PREMIERE: Enjoy performances from SKE48 Kenkyuusei and NMB48. Furthermore, join Miki Nishino in her Dance Classroom.

2.title: AKB48 Show Undokai SP
2.plot: Infiltration Series - 1st AKB48 Group Rivalry Sports Meet; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Mukaichi Mion; Nishino Miki's Energetic Dance Classroom .

4.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Ima, Hanashitai Dareka ga Iru
4.plot: Eigth installment from N46 SHOW series. This time: Cute Maid's Electrics Store and Infiltration Series - Nogizaka46 "Midsummer National Tour 2015" Tour Final.

5.title: I Don't Need a Romance
5.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - Camera Coverage; General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Minegishi Minami.

6.title: Memories Rather Than Unrequited Love
6.plot: 48 Group Daily Series - At the Handshake Event; Nishino Miki's Energetic Dance Classroom; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits.

7.title: Too Noisy Leakdate in the Cup!
7.plot: In this episode, HKT48 presents their 6th single "Shekarashika" while Love Crescendo shares their debut song, "Cup no Naka no Komorebi".

8.title: Angels and Demons
8.plot: This week, AKB48 will deliver you a performance from their latest single. Enjoy the short drama "Angels and Demons" and another musical number from NGT48.

9.title: 365 Days of Paper Airplanes
9.plot: Visit to Asadorama set; 48 Group Daily Series - At the Handshake Event; Former General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Matsui Jurina; Infiltration Series - HKT48 Sashihara Zachou Kouen.

10.title: AKB48 10th Anniversary SP
10.plot: Infiltration Series: Anniversary stages from AKB48 and other sister groups.

11.title: AKB48 10th Anniversary Memorial Performance
11.plot: Infiltration Series - AKB48 Theater 10th Anniversary Memorial Performance; 48 Group Daily Series - Captain Kitahara, Please Teach Us; Nishino Miki's Energetic Dance Classroom; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits.

12.title: Post-Kouhaku Special
12.plot: This week, check out the AKB48 and NMB48 performing the traditional Kouhaku Utagassen. And yet, behind the scenes Janken Tournament, which had been won by Nana Fujita.

13.title: 100th Episode Special
13.plot: Celebrating the 100th episode, AKB48 SHOW revisits some of the best performances and skits, selected by 48G members.

14.title: Naana Show!
14.plot: This week, the winner from 2015 Janken Tournament Nana Fujita presents her show and performs "Kuroi Tenshi" and her solo debut "Migiashi Evidence".

15.title: AKB48 Kouhaku Utagassen 2015 SP
15.plot: Infiltration Series - AKB48 Kouhaku Utagassen 2015; 48 Group Daily Series - At the Handshake venue; AKB48 Group Coming of Age Ceremony; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits.

16.title: NGT48 Debut SP
16.plot: Infiltration Series - Team NIII 1st Stage Shonichi; Nishino Miki's Energetic Dance Classroom; AKB48 Disaster Stricken Area Visits.

17.title: Contrary Grasshopper
17.plot: Former General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Kato Minami and Watanabe Miyuki.

18.title: Members' Selection
18.plot: A selection of sketches as chosen by the 48 Group members, Former General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Komiyama Haruka, and selection of performances as chosen by the 48 Group members.

19.title: Former General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room Business Trip SP
19.plot: This week, AKB48 brings their latest single, "Kimi wa Melody".

20.title: You're a Melody
20.plot: Former General Manager Takamina's Lecture Room - Matsumura Kaori; Infiltration Series - Miyazawa Sae's Graduation Concert.

21.title: It's Time for Chicken LINE!
21.plot: This week on 48 SHOW, enjoy the latest single from SKE48, "Chicken Line".

22.title: Max Toki 315 Gou
22.plot: NGT48 performs live "Max Toki 315 Gou", their first original song. Iwasa Misaki performs "Gomen ne, Tokyo". For episode's closing, Ayaka Umeda performs her ballad version for "Dakishimechaikenai" with accompaniment by Shu Yabushita.

23.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Harujion ga Sakukoro
23.plot: In the ninth installment from N46 SHOW series, Nogizaka46 performs their 14th single, "Harujion ga Sakukoro". Keyakizaka46 makes the meteoric debut on the show playing their first single, "Silent Majority". The episode closes with a acoustic rendition of "Shibuya River", performed by Yuichanzu.

24.title: Sweet-Bite Princess
24.plot: This week, enjoy NMB48's newest single "Amagami Hime" on opening performance. Enjoy highlights from "Minami Takahashi graduation concert" held live on Yokohama Arena, and a special performance from Mayu Watanabe & N Symphony.

25.title: 74 Billion Parts to You
25.plot: HKT48 performs their latest single, plus join NMB48 for the making of "Amagami Hime" music video.

26.title: NMB48 Live House Final - The Report
26.plot: Join NMB48 for the 'Infiltration Series' of the final concert from "NMB48 Live House Tour 2016". Plus, enjoy the comedy skit "Red Riding Hood".

27.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Sorezore no Isu
27.plot: Tenth installment from N46 SHOW series, for celebrating the release of their 2nd album.

28.title: Sashihara Show!
28.plot: Watch the special episode, hosted by Rino Sashihara, winner of 7 Senbatsu Sousenkyo (held in 2015).

29.title: Wings Aren't Needed
29.plot: This week, AKB48 shares with you a performance from their latest single, along with a second part from "NMB Live House Infiltration Report".

30.title: Post-Sousenkyo: Live from Niigata
30.plot: Stay tuned! On June 18, AKB48 SHOW hold a special live broadcast from HARD-OFF ECO STADIUM in Niigata with highlights from Senbatsu Sousenkyo.

31.title: HKT48 Special
31.plot: Infiltration Series: Join HKT48 for the special report of final performance from Hawks Town, and a look inside new theater from Nishitetsu Hall. Comedy Skit: Combinions Store. SakuraHaruka performs.

32.title: Tanabata Special: The 4 Naniwa Sisters
32.plot: Join AKB48 in another entertainment show. This week: Tsubasa wa Iranai, The Four Naniwa Sisters, Niki Nishino's Dance Classroom and so much more.

33.title: Love Trip
33.plot: AKB48 brings to you a first full version performance from their 45th single, "Love Trip", Miki Nishino in another dance lesson, NMB48 5th Generation auditions and much more.

34.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Hadashi de Summer
34.plot: Nogizaka46 brings to you their latest single in another installment from N46 SHOW series. In comedy skit, another case for Nogizaka Police. In "Infiltration Series", Mai Fukagawa's graduation concert.

35.title: Miyuki Watanabe's Graduation Special
35.plot: NMB48 performs their latest single, "Boku wa Inai", for Miyuki Watanabe's last performance on the show (prior AKB48 Fes). Furthermore, Milky and Sayanee performs "Ima Naraba".

36.title: Golden Love, Silver Love
36.plot: SKE48 performs live their latest single, "Golden Love, Silver Love". On Infiltration report, enjoy Yuki Kashiwagi's solo concert. On this week's comedy skit, "Handshake Event".

37.title: Another Love Trip
37.plot: Next week, we deliver to you AKB48's latest single "Love Trip", a AKB Fes performance from "Warukii" with SayaMilky, another dance lesson with Miki Nishino, and MV shooting of Upcoming Girls.

38.title: Rules Against Love
38.plot: Next week, join AKB48 for a infiltration report from "Majisuka Gakuen: Lost In The Supermerket". In the comedy skit, "Three Little Pigs".

39.title: 46 Show!
39.plot: For the first time, Nogizaka46 and Keyakizaka46 will host a themed episode together, including a special dance footage from Yurizaka46.

40.title: It's Great
40.plot: On next time, HKT48 will perform live their latest single. SKE48 will go shopping in the comedy skit, and a infiltration from 2nd 48G Undokai. Season finale.

1.title: AKB48 Show! #128: The 4th Season Start!
1.plot: SEASON 4 PREMIERE. NGT48 performs "Party ga Hajimaru yo" and brings a infiltration from 1st anniversary and 100th performance. Yui Yokoyama takes over the lecture room and interviews Miyu Takeuchi.

2.title: AKB48 Show! #129: Piano Recital
2.plot: Performances from TEAM 8, HKT48 and Caramel Cats. Comedy skit: Madoka Moriyasu as pianist. Infiltration from Senbatsu live performances.

3.title: AKB48 Show! #130: AKB48 Fes Special Edition
3.plot: Highlights from AKB48 Fes 2016 and the final 2 songs from the special, including a special birthday surprise for Sayaka Yamamoto. Comedy skit: Mighty (SKE48).

4.title: #131: Rainbow Rose
4.plot: JKT48 performs "River". Yui Yokoyama interviews Ryôka Oshima in her lecture room. Infiltration Report: making of from Sayaka's solo album "Rainbow", and studio live performance.

5.title: Nogizaka46 Show! The Meaning of Goodbye
5.plot: This week in N46 SHOW, enjoy performances from their latest single, "Sayonara no Imi". Infiltration report: Nogizaka46 4th Year Birthday Live. Comedy skit: Cute Maids.

6.title: AKB48 Show! #133: High Tension
6.plot: Next week, AKB48 will perform their 46th single, "High Tension". Infiltration report from 7th Janken Tournament. Yui Yokoyama interviews Paruru in her lecture room.

7.title: AKB48 Show! #134: More Tension
7.plot: Once again, AKB48 performs "High Tension". Yui Yokoyama interviews Mayu Watanabe in her lecture room. Infiltration report: Making of from Tentoumu Chu's music video.

8.title: Keyakizaka46 Show!
8.plot: Next week, stay tuned for a special presentation by Keyakizaka46.

9.title: AKB48 Show! #136: Sayaka Yamamoto Live Tour Infiltration Report
9.plot: Next week, NMB48 infiltrates Sayaka Yamamoto Live Tour. Studio live performances from JKT48 and Yuki Kashiwagi. Comedy skit: Employment Interview.

10.title: AKB48 Show! #137: Someone Else to Me
10.plot: For the Christmas special, Yui Yokohama interviews Anna Iriyama in her lecture room. Infiltration from SKE48 8th Generation auditions.

11.title: 67th Kouhaku Utagassen SP - Part 1
11.plot: For the first episode of 2017, join AKB48 for the special infiltration from the 67th NHK Kouhaku Utagassen, and the last performance from Haruka Shimazaki with the group.

12.title: 67th Kouhaku Utagassen SP - Part 2
12.plot: Next week, join AKB48 for a second part from Kouhaku Utagassen Special. Nogizaka46 performs "Inochi wa Utsukushii".

13.title: AKB48 Show! #140: Request Hour Special
13.plot: Recap from the RH2017 featuring the top song "Max Toki 315 Gou" performed by NGT48. Studio live performance from "Dear, My Teacher".

14.title: AKB48 Show! #141: Seijun Tired
14.plot: Next week, check out performances from AKB48 16th Generation, Tentoumu Chu and a studio live performance from Sayaka Yamamoto and Junichi Inagaki. Infiltration footage from "Recacheese" MV making-of.

15.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Nanami Hashimoto's Graduation SP
15.plot: Celebrating Nanami Hashimoto's graduation, this week join Nogizaka46 for another special entertainment show.

16.title: AKB48 Show! #143: Dasderella
16.plot: This week: Theatrical comedy skit from "Dasderella". Studio live performances from AKB48 Team 8 and SKE48's sub unit Next Position.

17.title: AKB48 Show! #144: 6 Years After Great Earthquake
17.plot: Six years after the earthquake, the AKB48 GROUP returns to the disaster area to interact with the local people.

18.title: AKB48 Show! #145: Shoot Sign, the Final Miki Nishino Dance Classroom
18.plot: Join AKB48 for another entertainment party. This week: Comedy skit at Handshake venue and the final lesson from "Miki Nishino's Dance Classroom". AKB48 performs "Shoot Sign".

19.title: AKB48 Show! #146
19.plot: Next time, NakoMiku performs "Tonari no Banana" in Kouhaku Taikou outfits. Miru Shiroma will be interviewed by Yui Yokoyama in her lecture room.

20.title: Tanamin Show!
20.plot: The next AKB48 SHOW will be a special episode, starring Miku Tanabe, winner of the 7th Janken Tournament of AKB48 GROUP.

21.title: Keyakizaka46 Show Once Again!
21.plot: Once again, Keyakizaka46 will host their show and performs live "Fukyowaon", as well of infiltration report of their music video.

22.title: AKB48 Show! #149: NGT48 Show!
22.plot: This week, watch the special episode celebrating NGT48's major debut release, "Seishun Dokei"

23.title: AKB48 Show! Remix #01
23.plot: Special selection from musical numbers within 150 episodes. The first one will feature a special feature of the members who graduate this spring.

24.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Influencer
24.plot: Join Nogizaka46 for another special themed episode. Infiltration report from N46 Underlive Tour; Comedy Skit - Nogizaka Police; Studio live performance from "Influencer".

25.title: Detective in School Uniform
25.plot: 48G General Captain Yui Yokoyama interviews Yui Oguri in her lecture room. Furthermore, Rin Okabe introduces the charm of local and Ibaraki prefecture.

26.title: Sneak Peek Special
26.plot: Infiltration report from NMB48 "Dareka no Tame ni" charity project, and making of from NGT48's "Seishun Dokei" music vídeo.

27.title: AKB48 Show! Remix #02: Team 8
27.plot: The second episode from "Remix Series" will feature a recap from past performances of Team 8.

28.title: Negaigoto no Mochigusare
28.plot: AKB48 performs their latest single. Studio live performance from "Ookami to Pride". Preliminaries from 2017 Sousenkyo. Anna Ishida's final performance.

29.title: Sashihara Show Once Again!
29.plot: Once again, Rino Sashihara will host her special episode, this time performing alongside the live band. Special footage: Behind the scenes of STU48 music video.

30.title: Post-Sousenkyo: Live from Okinawa
30.plot: Once again, AKB48 SHOW will broadcast a special edition, live from Okinawa. Watch the highlights and a dramatic cancellation of the main event from 9th AKB48 GROUP GENERAL ELECTION.

31.title: AKB48 Show! Remix #03: Nogizaka46 Show Remix
31.plot: This time, watch a recap from the best performances of NOGIZAKA46 SHOW.

32.title: Mirumiru Art Club debut (featuring Sayaka Yamamoto)
32.plot: New segment debut: Mirumiru's Art Club. Yuri Yokomichi takes over the "Dance Classroom".

33.title: STU48 Debut Special + Girls in the Borderline
33.plot: Special report from STU48 1st Generation auditions. AKB48 General Elections - Girls on the Borderline. STU48 performs their debut song.

34.title: Sweet Taste of Mango
34.plot: Next week, Miru Shiroma interviews Nana Okada in her Art Club. Special Talk: 3rd Generation Sync Talk (Unpublished Edition).

35.title: Destination Singapore!
35.plot: NMB48 performs "Masaka Singapore". Yui Yokoyama interviews Juri Takahashi in her lecture room.

36.title: Could a Kiss Be Something for Which One Can Do Nothing But Wait?
36.plot: HKT48 performs their latest single. Comedy skit: Women too familiar with the industry". Special report from STU48's Nana Okada Love Captain Room.

38.title: Nogizaka46 Show! Nigemizu
38.plot: This week, Nogizaka46 performs their newest single "Nigemizu". The 3rd Generation performs the coupling song "Mirai no Kotae". Infiltration report from N46 Midsummer Tour in Meiji Jingu Stadium, and first live from 3rd Generation.

39.title: AKB48 Show! Remix #04: Keyakizaka46 Show Remix
39.plot: This week, watch a recap from the best performances of KEYAKIZAKA46 SHOW, featuring commentary from TAKAHIRO, lead singer from EXILE.

40.title: Sashihara Show! The 3rd Act
40.plot: Once again, Rino Sashihara will host her special episode for winning the 9th Annual Sousenkyo. Her produced idol group =LOVE will perform their debut single.

41.title: AKB48 Show! Remix #05: Acoustic SP
41.plot: Next time on AKB48 SHOW REMIX, watch the best acoustic performances from this program. Season finale.

-1.title: AKB48 SHOW Presents: The Girls on the Borderline (SSK2017)
-1.plot: 1 Hour Special with highlights from the 9th General Elections held in Niigata, and graduation announcement from Mayu Watanabe.

imdb.title: AKB48 Show!
plot: Enjoy the entertainment show comprised of songs, comedy skits and short dramas performed by AKB48.
